title: An online wishlist with real time alerting system
description: A website or an app where you can bookmark items from different websites. The website can monitor amazon, ebay, etc... In order to alert the user **within seconds** when the item is discounted
pros: Useful for users, easy word of mouth
Can be easily monetized with affiliation programs or different range of alerting subscriptions
I'm not aware of real time alerting out there for shopping...
cons: Platforms to be monitored are so many!
Technical challenge is nice, but not easy for a single dev
There are already well established competitors like CamelCamelCamel
Localization, scaling, etc... Can be hard
